body.raw:
{
    "name": "陳先生",
    "cellphone": "0912345678",
    "residence": "台中市",
    "identity": "1",
    "travel_histroy": "1",
    "travel_country": "香港",
    "travel_destination": "",
    "occupation": "6",
    "occupation_other": "前端工程師",
    "contact_history": [
        4,
        6
    ],
    "contact_multi": "1",
    "contact_other": "公司",
    "cluster": [
        1,
        2
    ],
    "cluster_multi": "2",
    "cluster_date": "2020-05-02"
}

request.description:
插入範例和命名
{
    "name": "陳先生",
    "cellphone": "0912345678",
    "residence": "台中市",//居住地
    "identity": "1", //0:就診, 1:陪同, 2:其他
    "travel_histroy": "1", //0:無, 1: 曾出國
    "travel_country": "香港", //出國的國家名稱, history為1時必填
    "travel_destination": "",//旅遊地, history為2時必填
    "occupation": "6",//0:無, 1,2,3,4,5,6: 其他
    "occupation_other":"前端工程師",//其他職業(可null, 6被勾選擇必填)
    "contact_history":[4,6], //接觸史 array 0:無, 1,2,3,4(如果勾選，則contact_multi裡頭加入),5,6:其他
    "contact_multi": "1", //0,1
    "contact_other": "公司",//其他接觸史(可null, 6被勾選擇必填)
    "cluster": [1,2],//群聚 0:無, 1(如果勾選，則cluster_multi裡頭加入),2,3,4
    "cluster_multi": "2",//0,1,2
    "cluster_date": "2020-05-02"//自主健康管理日期(yyyy-mm-dd) 如果cluster為2時必填
}
